website_summaries.verdict: Very inexpensive bench made from natural bamboo for toughness and style.
pros: Small entryway bench at 18 inches tall and 11.2 inches deep, so it can fit in a tight space
Contains two rack shelves under the seat for storing items
Available in a dark or light wood stain
One of the least expensive entryway benches you'll find
Bamboo is an eco-friendly type of wood
cons: Very small bench length at just over 27 inches

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, Small Bench
customer_reviews.text: I really liked that it was in the small it fit perfect in my unused space.... it especially helped me tidy up my shoes, my babies shoes, and the hubbies shoes. Read the dimensions since it is on the smaller size, but again perfect for me. It is able to carry the weight of my husband and I sitting on it. Pretty sturdy piece and no damage to the piece whatsoever. An added bonus is that it was super easy to build.
customer_reviews.author: Sprinklecheerfulness

customer_reviews.title: Best and stylish shoe storage
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this bench for my shoes! It fits perfectly in the nook of my room I wanted it for and is doing a great job to keep my shoes organized and off the floor. It came with all the tools needed to put together and was really easy to build. It's very sturdy and appealing to the eye. So glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mel Point

customer_reviews.title: Too small, does'nt feel safe to sit on
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and smaller than I thought it would be. It doesn't feel safe to sit on, and you can hear the wood creaking and almost cracking if it is sat on. I'm assuming this is due to the gap between the leg supports and the top of the bench. That's right, the top of the bench does not touch the legs! There's about a half-inch gap. This seems to be a design flaw, since all the bolts fit perfectly. TL;DR: I'm waiting for this thing to collapse under me, and I'm 200 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Zach

customer_reviews.title: Great Electronics shelf too!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough about this product. I have assembled many items over the years and this one stands out. Just while assembling it, I thought of one word...quality. I knew this wasn't going to wobble or be off balance. Assembly was too easy. It looks absolutely gorgeous underneath my TV credenza. I have my cable box on top and the DVD down below so they have plenty of room to breathe and not overheat. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jym396

customer_reviews.title: Small Attractive Bench
customer_reviews.text: This review is for the HOMFA Natural Bamboo Shoe Rack Bench, though why anyone would want to use this as a shoe rack bench is more than I can tell. I bought the bench to use as an indoor plant stand and if fills the purpose perfectly. I can find no negatives. The item came well packed. Tools are included (however you will be happier if you have your own 10 mm wrench). The wood is nicely finished. Directions are good if not great. I used the wrong screws the first time THOUGH THIS WAS NOT THE DIRECTIONS' FAULT. The assembled bench looks attractive. For a plant stand it is sturdy but I would not sit on it myself.
customer_reviews.author: Cranky Old Woman

customer_reviews.title: Great little bench for my entry!
customer_reviews.text: This bench was extremely well-packaged for shipping, very easy to assemble and is quite sturdy. It's the perfect size for my narrow entry, and deep enough for me to sit on while putting on shoes. NOTE, I'm a petite woman with size 6 shoes. This bench is 17 3/4" tall and the seat is 11 1/4" deep, so a non-petite person may find this bench too low to the ground, and too narrow to comfortably sit on or store shoes. My shoes fit perfectly on the shelves, 3 pairs of tennis/walking shoes per shelf. Given the smaller size, I believe this is a great bench for kids to use! Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: PrinczBma

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my closet because I'm trying to get all my millions of shoes organized and my closet space is very limited. While this shelf doesn't offer excessive capacity for shoes, it worked exactly as I hoped. I was very pleased with how it looked (even when taking it out of the box), it was super easy to assemble, and is fulfilling its life long dream of holding my shoes! I was so happy with it that I just ordered a second one to place right next to it in my closet.
customer_reviews.author: Jolie Turk

customer_reviews.title: Better Quality than the Metal Ones on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one to replace one of the more expensive metal ones on Amazon. This one is much better quality and looks much nicer. One of the smaller pieces on the top of the bench had a crack in it but I don't think it will effect its structural quality. It took 50 minutes to put together on my own, not difficult and the instructions were super clear and easy to follow. It also came nicely packaged. It is very light weight as it is bamboo but seems plenty strong enough.
customer_reviews.author: The Tally Ho

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: Super Rack Highest Quality, Much Better than I expected. Needs Assembly, Very Easy to assemble. I Had no trouble with this because I have used similar Bolts and Nuts. The only Change they may make is to the Instructions. I did not need them but someone else may. They Should explain about the Round Nut that fits in the Hole. and The Slot should face toward the Bolt hole! This should be shown on the Instruction Sheet for people who are not Mechanically Inclined.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: Easier than Ikea and better quality
customer_reviews.text: If you can put together anything from Ikea - this will be super easy - instructions are included. And again, easier to understand than any instructions from Ikea. Everything you need is included for assembly. Good quality bamboo, smells like bamboo and not like chemicals. Attractive and great for entryway - has totally solved our shoe and backpack chaos. And yes - other people have commented it only holds six pairs of shoes total - three on each shelf. Excellent value for the money - I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Redmond Weasel

customer_reviews.title: A great little shoe rack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little shoe rack. The dimensions are just right, it looks good, and all the holes were in the right places, making it a snap to put together. Speaking of putting it together, the directions are great. I'm not tremendously handy, so if I can put this together, I'm pretty sure anyone can. The feet are rough, so I'm probably going to stick some felt on them or something. It also doesn't feel like it can bear a lot of weight--but for the purpose I bought it for (a shoe rack, not a bench), it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: probably best for smaller people or children
customer_reviews.text: My wife specifically asked for this. During assembly I noticed a few things. The instructions are not very clear, but if you look everything over and plan properly, you should not have any issues. It goes together well. They also give you extra hardware in case you lose something. That was nice to see. It appears study, but I would not push it. My wife weighs 120lbs, and it specifies that a load rating for 220lbs. However, I told her NOT to stand on it. I don't think I would trust it for that. For my wife's purposes; this was a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Buery

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy, Easy to Assemble, Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Really like this little table/bench/shoe rack. It has so many uses and yes, it is very sturdy. I have it sitting by my front door to hold shoes. Since it’s sitting beside a chair the height is perfect to sit drinks on. The length is just right to sit aside an average side chair it won’t stick out to bang your knees on when walking past it. It makes for a nice little piece of accent furniture where needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited to buy this bench for my front entry way. However, when I actually finished assembling it, I didn't trust anyone to sit on it because it felt so flimsy. I followed to instructions exactly, the issue came when the screw holes wouldn't line up correctly simply because they were drilled out of alignment. Overall it's an okay bench, but not entirely functional in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: RachelTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Went together well, sturdy enough for me at 195 to sit on, but the size is too small. Look at the pictures and you see tiny shoes or narrow high heels. Will not hold 3 pairs of my size 11.5 sneakers/shoes on 1 rack because its too narrow. Really a bad design. I can't understand when you build a prototype or design something, that you don't measure 3 pairs of average shoes / boots and make sure they fit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Put Together, all parts/tools included
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack was extremely easy to put together, the directions are small and hard to see the diagrams, but if you use your brain, it's a breeze. They send you all the necessary parts, screws, bolts, etc. and the tools required to screw everything in. Smells like fresh paint and stain. Very well made. I think it's a little expensive, but it's the same price as all the others, so I suppose this is the new going rate for a shoe rack.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It’s small, but perfect for by the door where everyone throws off their shoes. My husband said I’ll never train everybody to use it, but after keeping up with it and everyone sees how nice it is and no tripping over shoes at the door they are now trained to put it there themselves. Just took a little effort and convincing, but well worth the effort.
customer_reviews.author: D. Holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Slight imperfections QA missed
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these. One was perfect but the other had some imperfections. Both product was shrink wrapped so this means QA was not performed on one. The issue I found was that one of the legs was splintered see pic 1. The other issue is that I found two surfaces with paint/lacquer chips in pic 2. I'm keeping both as the imperfections doesn't affect function but sharing the information for others to make an informed decision.
customer_reviews.author: epac

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute little table! Perfect for organizing my living room! I had shoes just laying around in a corner and now they are neat tucked away. The product is pretty sturdy and super simple to put together. Took me maybe 20 min from unboxing to finished! I only wish the color matched my other furniture a little better. The product is dark wood and I have a dark cherry wood. Great product for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Roya Mousseau

customer_reviews.title: Every thing you need in a bench.
customer_reviews.text: Quickly put together, lightweight but very sturdy little piece of furniture. Love the extra functionality of shoe rack and bench. If I move this will definitely be coming with. Bet I could take it apart and put it back together without any loss of stability like you see and most assembly it yourself 'cheap' furniture. This one is anything but cheap and totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Holds up really well, great buy.
customer_reviews.text: This bench is so great! It’s cheap, sturdy, water resistant so far. I’ve had it for at least 7 months and it still looks great. We have it loaded up with shoes and had a water bottle leak on it all night and you can’t tell at all. I get complements on it and will probably get another to go next to it. Good size for regular shoes if you need space for boots the shelves are too tight.
customer_reviews.author: K. Sommer

customer_reviews.title: Super sturdy and functional
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this sturdy sitting bench and shoe holder by my back door. It’s just the right size to sit on it and holds 6 pairs of women shoes. Probably less for men’s but you can stack to fit more. Maybe a lot of screws to install but it’s well worth it. I recommend this shoe bench, the black Walnut finish makes it contemporary too.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Great solid shoe bench!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my girlfriend's closet. She loves it. It's very well made for the price. I would not hesitate to stand on it if I had to. The shelves are tall enough to accommodate most of her shoes/sneakers. The color is a nice neutral (who cares though in a closet). I was pretty impressed when I finished assembling it. I almost bought another one for my closet, but I'm happy with my pile of shoes...
customer_reviews.author: Timothy A Roaix

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy to assemble, small
customer_reviews.text: Cute bench, easy to assemble, smaller than I anticipated! I should have paid more attention to the measurements -- my main concern was that the bench not be too big for our entryway (and it's definitely not!). It will still work for our house, just will place it in a different area and it will be great for the kids putting on/ taking off shoes. Pictures to show its size relative to an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Hinz

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Fancy looking
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble. I assembled it myself and it took about 45min- 1hour. I love that it matches my wooden floors and it does not look cheap. It’s very sturdy and I have sat on it while putting in my shoes ( hasn’t got lose or broken). It’s s great shoe rack. I’ve had the shoe rack for about 2 months now.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: The shoe bench looks great, but it's not as sturdy as I was ...
customer_reviews.text: The shoe bench looks great, but it's not as sturdy as I was hoping. I'm 97 kilograms and it's had a quite a few top slats snap and pop loudly when I put my weight on it to change shoes. Also, I've picked up a couple of splinters into my hands while kneeling down and putting my hand on the top to support myself. If it was beefier and better sanded, I'd like it much more. For now, the shoe bench suffices for my needs and I know to buy better quality in the future. Still, I expect this to last for several years at least.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Cannon

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and even though I'm pretty sure I could sit ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this shoe rack for about two weeks. It looks good and even though I'm pretty sure I could sit on it without breaking it (being a 190lb male), I don't want to test that theory. It's smaller than I thought it would be and holds three pair of shoes for each rack. The top is flat so it can be used as a table. Putting it together was pretty simple and hard to make a mistake. Once put together, it felt pretty strong. All in all, it's a good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great for small space storage
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and the size is exactly as advertised, which is good because I needed something a specific size for my closet. It assembled easily with clear instructions and all tools provided. I put it together in 15 minutes with no problems at all. I haven't used bamboo before and was a little worried about odor (especially being inside a closet) but this doesn't have any discernible odor. I might have to get a few more.
customer_reviews.author: jwmanus

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality ,would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Extremely strong. Well built. Fits my gigantic shows great but I had to buy two cuz I have like 12 pairs of shoes. Can be used as a bench to sit on while putting on shoes. I love it in the natural color. Made with bamboo too. Dove tail joints also for a stronger joint . The overall strength is incomparable to the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Short but strong
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was going to be taller, but that's my fault for not reading the dimensions. Other than that it's a great, sturdy product. We are a family of 7 and it can hold one pair of each of our shoes. Now if only I could figure out how to make my kids actually put their shoes on it instead of beside it...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth L.

customer_reviews.title: Sloppy finish
customer_reviews.text: Price was good and assembly easy but finish was sloppy (see picture), spraying uneven or incomplete looking, especially on the underside. They let the paint accumulate and dry thicker in some parts, and not enough coverage other areas. I had bought three other very similar benches from Songmics that were much better finished. I thought I'd take a chance on this one, but should have not.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Check the measurements before ordering
customer_reviews.text: Humorously small bench. Easily could have checked the measurements myself but didn't. When it was finally assembled, there was no going back. Its a childs size. One butt at a time and only 3 pairs of shoes each shelf. That's ok, I just was expecting a much larger one. We probably would have paid an extra 7 or whatever to have it be a bit bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Boo

customer_reviews.title: CHEAPLY MADE AND PARTS WERE MISSING!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack seems like it's very cheaply made. No way it's all real wood! Was missing many parts so I could not finish putting it together. Have to contact the company that made it to get the parts I'm missing. Kind of disappointed with the purchase overall, so 3 stars is me being GENEROUS! Thinking of returning it to buy a better made product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: basic shoe rack for sneakers and sandals. No boots or high heels. Limited weight capacity
customer_reviews.text: It is a beautiful shoe rack, if not super high end. I am 160-170lbs and can sit on it, but is not sturdy to accomodate rough use or constant heavy weight. Shelves are not adjustable. Shelves are not tall enough to accommodate boots or stilletos Easy assembly, came with all screws and tools needed for assembly. One of the boards was slightly warped, but in the end everything was able to come together.
customer_reviews.author: SlyJane4396

customer_reviews.title: Came out of box with large splits on top
customer_reviews.text: My initial review i only gave 2 stars, but because their customer service was so great i have recently upped my rating. I was not able to get a new benh because they are sold out of the one i wanted. But they have sent me a refund. Here was my review: So i bought two of these one for my house and one for my mom. I put mine together and absolutely love it. But i went to my moms house and hers has two giant cracks in the top. Im super disappointed and hope i can get it replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ketcher

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy enough for at least 180 pound adult to sit ...
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to fit between two doors in the "mud room" and this fit the bill. Sturdy enough for at least 180 pound adult to sit on. I do wish the bottom was a little taller so that I could more easily slip some sandals or flip flops under it.
customer_reviews.author: Bela Sziklassy

customer_reviews.title: Hard to assemble, not worth the money, not sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble. Returning 1 that is unopened. Trying to get a refund for the other. Mine is not good weight load bearing. Since it will be too hard to put together again with another product, I am trying to secure a refund. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Burbidge Merkley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is great for my small living space! It was very easy to put together, it is a little under a foot in width and it holds about six pairs of shoes. My husband has large feet so his shoes stick out a little, but only about an inch. Otherwise it's great! It also holds our weight when we sit on it to put our shoes on even though it feels kind of like it wouldn't. It must be real bamboo!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette Yusupova

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: After about 5 months or more its held up and we like it. Easy to build and so far its done its job, no complaints. Def worth the price and I would buy another if needed. FYI held up so far through 1 Chicago Winter thus far...
customer_reviews.author: Locdizzle

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe rack for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, lightweight and looks great! My husband and I assembled this in probat less than 20 minutes and it holds a fair amount of shoes. Some people said it is not very sturdy but I think it is, as long as you are not trying to sit on it. Looks great in my sunroom and definitely helps cut down on the clutter at the front door!
customer_reviews.author: CLR

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, useful, but make sure to use the tools properly
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shoe rack. Sturdy, good quality, and easy to put together... If you aren't me. The directions were fine but I got frustrated at one point and just let the hubby finish it. The nuts are pretty tiny and while I'm sure a monkey could have put it together, it was not going to be this monkey. I still think it's awesome though. Great quality, true to the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: This shoe bench is so cute. It does not look cheap which is a plus. It is definitely a great addition for small spaces. I use it for my super tiny entry way and it fits perfectly! I highly recommend this. The only con is the price is a little steep, but if you are looking around all other bench storages are way higher in price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for the money
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these benches for my home. They assembled fairly easily and with a bit of effort are sturdy. The “wood” finish on the top looks a bit cheap so I am going to make some pillows to place on top of mine.
customer_reviews.author: Cmbv23

customer_reviews.title: SUPER LIGHTWEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: CONS: 1) Does not feel sturdy 2) Extremely light (I wouldn’t put anything heavy on it) 3) Expensive for what it is PROS: 1) Easy to assemble 2) It looks nice 3) Took forever to get here
customer_reviews.author: Raven D.

customer_reviews.title: These shoe racks are really nice and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We bought three benches for an event where we needed to provide a place to take off shoes and everybody wanted to know where they are from. These shoe racks are really nice and sturdy. Easy to assemble and look great (we bought the natural bamboo color). That said, one of the bamboo legs had split and frankly we did not have time to ask for a replacement. It was a minor setback and we used that bench only to store and not to sit, although I feel the bench was safe to use. I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: easy to install and lasts
customer_reviews.text: pretty easy to put together and looks nice on the eyes. I have this in front of my apartment by the door and a much nicer way to store shoes than on the floor or an ugly metal rack. WOuld recommend this for a price conscious shopper.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I bought this as a stool for my dog to look out the bathroom window while I am at work. They have to stay in the confines of the tiled area of my home (kitchen, laundry room and bathroom) due to the one that can not be trusted. I am not sure if he will use it but we shall see - it looks nice though :)
customer_reviews.author: Sumi Casey

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, but very Unstable after assembly
customer_reviews.text: Looks good,but very Unstable after assembly!! Don't know how to make it stable...every time when we sit on it then it was shake a lot!! If the seller can help me to replace or give me something to make it stable that will be great!
customer_reviews.author: Lee A.

customer_reviews.title: Love how it looks!
customer_reviews.text: This looks just as pictured. I use it in my kitchen-- howeverrrrr if we used it daily to put shoes on and sit on I don't think it would still be standing. It is not very sturdy, more of a decorative piece and I do use it as a shoe rack but adults don't sit on it!
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated, but Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall. It’s sturdy and was really easy to put together. Also, for the price the quality is really good. It’s a bit smaller than I’d hoped, it only fits 4 pairs of my husbands shoes, but it’s a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey E.

customer_reviews.title: Cracks very easily just from sitting and putting shoes on. Did not even mis-use item.
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this is exactly what happened. I bought this bench October 6th, assembled it, and used it for just over 1 month now. I'm the ONLY one using it and I am 190 lbs. I'm not jumping on it or doing anything but tying my shoes before I go out once a day at most. The thing already cracked. The crack is on the surface of where you sit, on the main board. I'll see how much longer it will hold up but it's a piece of crap in my opinion. Maybe it can be used for kids, that's the only reason I gave it two stars instead of one.
customer_reviews.author: ALo

customer_reviews.title: Get one!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little 3-tier shoe rack for the money. It is short at about 28", so you might want to consider the longer bamboo shelves if you need more space. There were no rough edges, and it was easy to assemble. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: Lyndie

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great at my front door. Simple farmhouse décor style and it fits perfectly. We use all 3 shelves for shoes/storage. We don't use it as a bench at all so I can't attest for it's sitting sturdiness.
customer_reviews.author: NikiM

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: The rack is good, sturdy and nice looking in my opinion. It fit nicely in the small area I have to put a bedside table. It was easy to put together. Though it seems sturdy, I would not use it as a bench unless it's just for your shoes. : D
customer_reviews.author: SMA REVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: As described and suits our needs
customer_reviews.text: I took one star off since I would have preferred it be two inches wider. The shelves work okay for three pairs of my shoes, but a little narrow for more than two pairs of my husband's shoes. The top is not slatted, we mostly use it to prop our foot up on to tie laces.
customer_reviews.author: S. Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Does what it promises
customer_reviews.text: This bench is near our front door. It is sturdy enough for me or my 200 pound husband. Hold 4-6 pairs of shoes depending on the sizes. The only complaint I have is that I wish it were a bit higher. however, I knew the height when I bought it. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice & Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Very good for the price and also goes with the decor in my home. Fits about 9 pair of womens shoes when using the 2 racks. Wouldn't recommend utilizing the top part as a bench as it doesnt seem sturdy enough for sitting. Assembly was easy- took about 30 mins total and had all the parts and tools needed to put it together. Overall good buy and it looks nice.
customer_reviews.author: Cam

customer_reviews.title: Glued Together. Didn't Even Last One Yeae
customer_reviews.text: This is very cheaply made. The slats holding the shoes are merely glued down at the edges and came loose with normal use after less than a year. We have another bamboo shoe rack from years ago that has held up nicely. This one is not the same quality of construction. Would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Matches perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my small space. Amazon recommended the matching coat holder and I’m so happy they did. Matches perfect, easy to assemble. There was a slight nick on the side I’m assuming from shipping not quite sure to be honest but wasn’t enough for me to return.
customer_reviews.author: Carli

customer_reviews.title: A Great Piece of Small Furniture at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: This product came beautifully packaged. I was impressed. The directions were easy to follow and assembly took very little time. The finished bench is attractive and sturdy. It could easily be used for things other than shoes and is attractive enough to be used out of a closet. Nicer than any show/rack I've ever encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Nice but small
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for our space but be sure to measure, this is not a full-size bench. Nice color and style. Holds towels, etc rather than a bench we actually sit on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I put this together in 15 mins and tested it out. I love it! I live in a small apartment and this fits perfect next to the door in the hallway! It is very sturdy. My boyfriend sat on it and he's a big guy, a bit shakey but still very sturdy. It does fit 3 pairs of shoes on each level. It's perfect! We love it!
customer_reviews.author: jacww

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality. Very Easy to Assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase ever!!! Fast delivery. Great packaging and Quality. I love that the Color also matches my living room. I highly recommend this product. It’s best for people who want to keep 6-8 pairs of shoes/slippers on their doorway. Thank You.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy shelves
customer_reviews.text: There are made of nice strong wood not cheap pine. They’ve got nice sturdy weight. Extra screws and nuts in case you lose one. Good product!
customer_reviews.author: doryshyn

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this bench/shoe organizer. It looks beautiful and sturdy. It's very easy to assemble too! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KatherineRaney

customer_reviews.title: Fits six pairs of tennis, can sit on
customer_reviews.text: Nice, you can sit on this to put on your shoes. Can hold 6 pairs, very slim so can fit in tight places. I have this in my small laundry room at the entry to my house
customer_reviews.author: Adam M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product for the price, easy to assemble, would buy again
customer_reviews.text: Other than this being wider than the listed 11" (more like 11.5" wide), the item itself is very nice, pretty sturdy and easy to assemble. I'm not using it as a bench, so not sure if it's really sturdy enough for that, but it's great to have by the door for shoes and to dump other things atop to free up your hands. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Onalee

customer_reviews.title: Cute, easy to assemble, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So easy to put together. My son did help me a little. Took maybe 30 minutes tops. First about 3-4pairs of shoes per rack (I have a 3 y/o with little shoes). For adults will fir 3 pairs per rack. It's cute, exactly like the picture. Thinking of ordering more to use as side tables
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality with missing parts.
customer_reviews.text: Thought I was getting a product of decent quality. That was not the case with this item. Right out of the box it was missing 2 out of the 4 legs. Out of the 2 that I had, one was shorter than the other. I don't believe that this bench would have even held my weight once I would have sat down on it. I contacted the company but they never responded. Poor customer service to go along with their poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Secret_Squirrel

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice
customer_reviews.text: I just got my shoe rack delivered and hurried to put it together. It was pretty simple and fairly quick to put together and it looks really nice. Much better than the cheap metal one we used to have, by far! I'll be ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: KTDubya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe rack is great! Ideal for tighter locations. My husband's work boots go on the top, our shoes on the bottom. Even extra room on top for a plant and a basket of dog leashes. My eight-year-old son and I put it together - it's not complex. :-)
customer_reviews.author: choochootwo

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: This shoe bench just arrived today, and it looks pretty cheap. Not that big of a deal, considering the price, but it's also scratched all over the place. The scratches are all on the top of the bench and shelves, so they are all visible. Also looks like there are either defects in the wood or something spilled on it, and rather than sanding, it was just painted over (see photos).
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive & easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if it is sturdy enough to sit on; I would not. However, it is very attractive and was easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Not worth it. Trying to be a songmics but more complicated to put together. Holes created a skewed look. Works for shoes, but disappointed in quality. I’d recommend NOT buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan C

customer_reviews.title: I like it.
customer_reviews.text: You're not buying a shoe bench, you're buying a bunch of pieces that you have to assemble into a shoe bench. Takes about 30-60 minutes to assemble depending on your skill level. Once it's assembled it works fine. Nice looking IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Briteboy

customer_reviews.title: Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: The bench is small enough to not be in the way in my hall, but big enough to sit on while putting my shoes on.
customer_reviews.author: Jean B.

customer_reviews.title: SOLID and cute!
customer_reviews.text: This little shoe bench is solidly built and very easy to assemble. I was really impressed with how well it went together for the price. It looks very high-end in the entryway. I would definitely buy again for other entries and recommend it to others. It holds about 3-4 pairs of shoes/slippers per shelf.
customer_reviews.author: tlight

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: I was very happy with the quality and good price but most happy with the ease of putting this item together.
customer_reviews.author: Misty

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a bit bigger, but I like it otherwise
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and has been pretty durable so far (has it for a couple months now). Same as pictured. Wish it was just a bit bigger for the price, but I like it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Decent, useful and good looking bench in our garage.
customer_reviews.text: My husband is happy he can sit to put in his shoes and the piece looks nice! I would say it’s not heavy duty so buyers should be aware of that fact. Still, for its price point and intended use, this is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Nevedita

customer_reviews.title: Love, love, love!
customer_reviews.text: I liked this bench so much that I bought another one. I got it originally for my entryway to hold shoes, but then I realized it would work great in my closet to hold more shoes & I also put some fabric storage boxes on the top shelf to hold sweaters & other folded items. Everything then looks so neat. It is sturdy & very easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: shopsalot

customer_reviews.title: Small, sturdy and super cute! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect! I wanted a small, sturdy but cute shoe rack and this is exactly that! It holds about 6-8 pairs of womens ankle booties, high heels or sneakers. Im ordering another!
customer_reviews.author: SheiswhoIam03

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shoe rack. I have it at the front door. It was very easy to assemble and it is very sturdy. I love the color. I would recommend this product. I am glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfectly in small spaces.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to fit in a particular spot, it's just the right size. It was easy to assemble, although the instructions could be more precise, i.e. the exact direction to face the legs so the screws fit on the correct way. I like this product. I needed it to sit on and store shoes and put my shoes on, it fits the bill.
customer_reviews.author: LESLIE HINELINE BOYER

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been great! I use it in my entry way to store shoes, but also for sitting on, and I've even stood on it a few times. It has held up like a champ! And it looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Bingaman

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble. Comes with tools needed. Once all parts are assembled this bench is very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: QFAMILY

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, Sturdy, Useful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, good looking and sturdy. It holds up to 4-5 shoes for man size 11.
customer_reviews.author: Ilknur G

customer_reviews.title: A welcome addition to my garage
customer_reviews.text: Two pairs of yard work shoes and two pairs running shoes are now neatly stored in the corner of my garage instead of just laying about just inside/outside the door. The bench is sturdy enough for me to use and I'm 210 pounds on a good day.
customer_reviews.author: Kent McLaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Assemble, Nice Color
customer_reviews.text: Took maybe 20 minutes to assemble (and I was watching TV). Kit came with all of the tools needed and it fits perfectly in my closet. Only complaint is the directions are pretty bare (i.e they dont tell you which direction the legs should face but its not hard to figure out) . Solid product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really impressed
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed by this shoe rack. It comfortably fits about 9 pairs of shoes, which is perfect for my needs. The top rack is perfect for boots. The bamboo is beautiful and it’s very sturdy. Great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks great.
customer_reviews.text: My teenage son put it together in minutes. It looks great. Perfect size for behind my front door when it’s open. Holds 6-9 adult pairs, depending on whether you use the top for shoes also. I wouldn’t use it as a bench, but for its purpose it’s perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Francis W.

customer_reviews.title: Great option to declutter your space
customer_reviews.text: Decent construction. Easy to build and it looks great in my entry way. I really needed something to handle the shoes that were cluttering my entryway and this was the perfect solution. Strong enough to support the weight of an adult and provides a place to sit while you take your shoes off.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Collins

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought another one a year later. Side by side, you can't tell which one is newer even though my family of 5 uses daily.
customer_reviews.author: J. $

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bench/open storage
customer_reviews.text: Easily put this together by myself in about 15 minutes while watching television. Perfect condition. Perfect color and ideal for inside my closet to sit while putting on lotion and shoes. Also stores my most frequently worn shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Durable and great look
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know how it was to put together since my husband did it. However, it looks great and very durable. We leave it sitting by the door because it still makes the room look nice
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Small and strong. Sitting next to my front Door... Excelente size and strong bamboo.
customer_reviews.author: Rodolfo_CR

customer_reviews.title: Enough room to fit shoes/sandals and sturdy to boot
customer_reviews.text: It takes a little bit of time to put it together but well worth the price. Bought another one and it took less time to assemble now that I know what I was doing. Enough room to fit shoes/sandals and sturdy to boot! (no pun :D!)
customer_reviews.author: Rey M

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Omg I put this together in 20 minutes. Without the help of my husband!!! (He said he would have to do it). It's beautiful. Easy to put together and looks great in the sunroom!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice ans sturdy
customer_reviews.text: The quality is very good. Just a little pricey. I got two already. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Mark Twain

customer_reviews.title: Like it
customer_reviews.text: Really like this. Only reason for 4 stars is because I couldn't get it to be completely level. Other then that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Grant

product_meta.title: HOMFA Bamboo Shoe Rack Bench 3-Tier, Shoe Organizer, Storage Shelf, Good Load Bearing, Ideal for Entryway Hallway Living Room and Corridor Dark Brown
product_meta.description:
Color:Dark Brown
Description:
Eco-Friendly Material
Made of 100% natural eco-friendly bamboo, very durable.

Multiple Purpose, More features are for you to find!
Our bamboo rack is suitable to be placed in the hall, living room, bedroom, balcony, porch,etc.

Safe Design
Rounded corner and counter bore surface, delicate design, so this rack will not cause harm to your belongings or your children.

Durable and easy to clean
Well made, sturdy and durable, easy to clean and maintain.

Multi-Use
Dual purposes, you can use it as a shoe rack and seating bench according to your preferences.


Specification:
● Color: Dark Brown;
● Size: 3 tiers
● Material: natural bamboo
● Dimensions: 27.5"L x 11"W x 17.7"H
● Height of each tier: 6.3"
● Load capacity: 220 lbs
● Net weight:9.7 lbs
● Package size:29.1"Lx12.6"Wx3.1"H

Package include:
1 x Shoe Rack
1 x Instructions
1 x Accessories Bag(included an Allen key)


● Self-tapping screws are supplied in the package.
● Please take care when you are install this shoe bench, make sure that all holes are aligned between the panel.
● We suggest that when you are dealing with the self-tapping screws, you have to twisting the screws very hard and make them are aligned.
● Otherwise, the screws will warp, even the product break if not deal with properly.
feature_bullets: Eco-Friendly Material: Made of 100% natural bamboo, this bench rack is stable, durable, look good and eco-friendly.
Safe Design: With its smooth surface, countersink screws and round corners, this rack will not cause harm to your belongings or your children.
Multi-Use: A combination of shoe rack and bench to help you saving space.The 3 tiers bamboo rack is suitable to be placed in the hall, living room, bed room, balcony,etc.
Easy to Assemble and Strong Stability: Designed with removable built-in fittings, it is more stable and durable than using self-tapping screws. All fittings have been treated for rust prevention.
Product Size: 27.5"L x 11"W x 17.7"H;Height of each tier: 6.3".
